name: GetDiscountTemplateByID
description: Get DiscountTemplate by the given ID
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `DiscountTemplates:View`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

response_samples.sample:
{
  "ActionData": {
    "Amount": 123.456,
    "ApplyToLine": true,
    "FinancialDispersion": 2,
    "FinancialDispersionScriptID": 123,
    "MaximumAmount": 123.456,
    "RequiresReason": true
  },
  "ActionType": "V2:DISCOUNTAMOUNT",
  "AppliesTo": 2,
  "BackendID": "string",
  "CampaignID": 123,
  "ConditionType": 1,
  "Conditions": [
    {
      "Data": {},
      "ID": 123,
      "Type": "V2:COUPONORIGINATINGORDERORGANIZATIONUNIT"
    }
  ],
  "CouponHandler": "string",
  "CouponsGeneratedByOtherDiscount": true,
  "CreatedByFullName": "string",
  "CreatedByID": 123,
  "CreationTime": "2024-09-25",
  "Description": "string",
  "DiscountOrderType": 2,
  "ID": 123,
  "ImageBlobID": "18e3d89d-1b3b-4dd3-880e-072c88f803fa",
  "IsActive": true,
  "IsExclusive": true,
  "LastModificationTime": "2024-09-25",
  "LastModifiedByFullName": "string",
  "LedgerClassID": "string",
  "MaximumUsage": 123,
  "MaximumUsagePerOrder": 123,
  "MaximumUsagePerUser": 123,
  "ModifiedByID": 123,
  "NeedsReason": true,
  "RestitutionOrganizationUnitID": 123,
  "RestitutionOrganizationUnitName": "string",
  "Trigger": 4,
  "UserUsageLimit": 123.456,
  "UserUsageReloadStrategy": "string"
}

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `DiscountTemplate`

E.name: FinancialDispersion
E.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - DivideInProportionToProductPrice
* `1` - MostExpensiveToCheapest
* `2` - CheapestToMostExpensive
* `3` - HighestToLowestTaxRate
* `4` - LowestToHighestTaxRate

CH.name: OrderProperties
CH.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - IsPickup
* `2` - CreatedByEmployee
* `4` - IsInterbranch
* `8` - IsB2B
* `16` - Duplicated
* `32` - Autocompleted
* `128` - ReturnToSupplier
* `256` - CustomTaxesApplied
* `512` - Replenishment
* `1024` - SoldByOverridden
* `2048` - ImportedFromLiveGuard
* `4096` - IsTransferOrder
* `8192` - IsReturnsTransferOrder
* `16384` - IsOffer
* `32768` - IsUnified
* `65536` - IsReturned
* `131072` - HasReturnLines
* `262144` - DownPayment
* `524288` - Restitution
* `1048576` - Repairs

CK.name: OrganizationUnitTypes
CK.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Shop
* `2` - WebShop
* `4` - Container
* `8` - Pickup
* `16` - Warehouse
* `36` - Country
* `64` - Franchise
* `128` - EVA
* `256` - TestOrganizationUnit
* `512` - DisableLogin
* `1024` - Supplier
* `1024` - ExternalSupplier
* `3072` - Consignment
* `4096` - B2b
* `8196` - Region
* `16384` - ReturnsPortal
* `32768` - Restitution
* `65536` - RepairCenter
* `131072` - Mobile

CQ.name: UserTypes
CQ.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Employee
* `2` - Customer
* `4` - Anonymous
* `8` - Business
* `17` - System
* `64` - Debtor
* `256` - LimitedTrust
* `512` - Tester
* `1024` - RemovedByRequest
* `2048` - Api
* `4096` - Impersonated

BR.name: ID
BR.description: This is the ID of a `DiscountTemplateCondition`

CS.name: Code
CS.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

CS.name: Message
CS.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

CS.name: RequestID
CS.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

CS.name: Type
CS.description: A short description of the error type.

CT.name: ExternalIDs
CT.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

CT.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
CT.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

CT.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
CT.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

C.name: AppliesTo
C.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Order
* `2` - Line
* `3` - Both

C.name: CampaignID
C.description: This is the ID of a `DiscountCampaign`

C.name: DiscountOrderType
C.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Sales
* `2` - Purchase
* `3` - All

C.name: ID
C.description: This is the ID of a `DiscountTemplate`

C.name: RestitutionOrganizationUnitID
C.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

C.name: Trigger
C.description:
Possible values:

* `-1` - SystemManaged
* `0` - Automatic
* `1` - Manual
* `2` - Coupon
* `4` - Bundles
* `5` - Loyalty
